# Draft:Hoop Queens Makeovers

| guests         = Kate Beckinsale
| prev           =
| next           =
}}
"Hoop Queens Makeovers" is the third episode of the tenth season of the American television series ''RuPaul's Drag Race All Stars''. It originally aired on May 16, 2025.
Episode
is a guest judge.]]
The four bottom contestants enter the Werk Room and discuss how to distribute points:
* Aja gives her point to Olivia Lux.
* Phoenix gives her point to DeJa Skye.
* Olivia Lux gives her point to DeJa Skye.
* DeJa Skye gives her point to Olivia Lux.
For the main challenge, the contestants give drag makeovers to collegiate women's basketball players. Teams of two are also tasked with recording and performing versus to a song.
The runway category is "Drag Family Resemblance". Kate Beckinsale is a guest judge. After critiques, the judges discuss all of the pairs, ultimately naming Bosco and Irene the Alien as the top two contestants of the week. The two face off in a lip-sync contest to "Pocketbook" by Jennifer Hudson featuring Ludacris. Irene the Alien wins the lip-sync and receives a prize. After the lip-sync, the bottom contestants award their final MVQ points on the main stage.
* Aja gives her point to DeJa Skye.
* DeJa Skye gives her point to Olivia Lux.
* Olivia Lux gives her point to Aja.
* Phoenix gives her point to Aja.
With the most points, Aja, Bosco, and Irene the Alien advance from the first bracket to the semi-finals. DeJa Skye, Olivia Lux, and Phoenix are eliminated from the competition. RuPaul reveals that one eliminated contestant will re-enter the competition at the finale.
